thread.title: The Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy matchup is off
thread.title_full: The Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy matchup is off

author: Jaleesa M. Jones
title: The Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy matchup is off
text:
The Chris Brown vs. Soulja Boy matchup is off Jaleesa M. Jones , USA TODAY 9:32 a.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 7 Shares 
Your first celebrity beef of 2017. Yes, really. (Photo: AP/Wireimage) 
Say Goodbye to that Chris Brown-Soulja Boy matchup. 
The artists exchanged fighting words on Twitter last month, with Brown deciding he was done with the #TwitterFingers and calling for a hands-on boxing match, a push that proved irresistible to heavyweights like Mike Tyson and Evander Holyfield as well as petty-weights like Floyd Mayweather and rapper/actor/producer 50 Cent. 
But, according to Soulja, Brown is now dodging the highly-anticipated bout. The rapper took to Twitter Monday to insult Brown and inform his followers that the singer declined to sign off on the fight. "Chris brown manager (called) my manager last night (and) said the fight is off and he's not signing (the) contract," he wrote . "Don't ask me about the (expletive) no more." 
Fans can, however, ask him about his mixtape, Big Soulja , which debuted the same day the rapper revealed the fight was canceled. 
A coincidence or heavy-hitting PR? You be the judge. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2lqPXV7 Most Popular
